QuestData.Title: Power Play
QuestData.Description: The Zandalari have found a way to infuse items of great power with the essence of their loa. These items are often passed from one generation to another, each recipient adding to the item's power.$b$bTwo such items exist here. To be specific, two masks, worn by two brothers.$b$bSpiritbinder Tu'chek and Arcanital Ra'kul must be stopped and their masks destroyed.$b$bKill them and return their masks to me. I will make sure the masks are disposed of.
QuestData.LogDescription: Retrieve the Mask of the Dark Mystic and the Mask of the Spirit-Caller from Spiritbinder Tu'chek and Arcanital Ra'kul within Conqueror's Terrace.
